thread.title: Early-blooming cherry blossoms draw massive crowds in Tokyo

title: Early-blooming cherry blossoms draw massive crowds in Tokyo
text:
Early-blooming cherry blossoms draw massive crowds in Tokyo 3:35pm BST - 01:11 
Tens of thousands of locals packed Ueno park as Tokyo's cherry blossom came into full bloom nearly nine days earlier than usual because of warmer weather. No reporter narration. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
